about_the_game:
This is Gravitators Original Soundtrack. There are 2 discs:

. Disc 1: Standard Album (WAV and MP3). Composed by Cristián D'Agustini.

. Disc 2: Loop Album (WAV and MP3). Each track can be listened in continuous loop, as in the game. It also includes 3 variations of in-game tracks: Shoot Them Down (Chill Version), Escorting the Nuke (Guitar Version) and May Gravity Be With You (Fast Version).

name: Gravitators Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 535 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2400 MB available space
